objects.description: Review privileged cloud account permission levels routinely to look for those that could allow an adversary to gain wide access.(Citation: TechNet Credential Theft)(Citation: TechNet Least Privilege) These reviews should also check if new privileged cloud accounts have been created that were not authorized.

external_references.description: Microsoft. (2016, April 15). Attractive Accounts for Credential Theft. Retrieved June 3, 2016.
Microsoft. (2016, April 16). Implementing Least-Privilege Administrative Models. Retrieved June 3, 2016.
